resources.string: Premium\n\nEnjoy HD videos, ad free content and more.

After signing in your TV, sort up Parental Controls to require a PIN to watch some videos.

 1. In a web browser, go to TVPlatform101.com/PIN and select the Parental Controls tab.

 2. Create or change your TVPlatform PIN.

 3. Under viewing restrictions, select viewing limit.

 4. Under Apply viewing restrictions, select devices to apply viewing restrictions, and then click save.

Your TVPlatform Pin is required before viewing videos at or above the selected restriction level.

If you are having a problem with our service and need help, go to: TVPlatform.com/videohelp.\n\nFor suggestions on improving our service , send an email message to TVPlatform feedback@xyz.com and we will review it.

TVPlatform terms of Use are available at TVPlatform.com/video/terms.

TVPlatform knows that you care how information about you is used and shared, and we appreciate your trust that we will do so carefully and sensibly. To read our privacy policy, go to TVPlatform.com/privacy.

TVPlatform.com/video/3rdpartysoftware.
